Analysis: Evolution of Sovereignty Attitudes

Source: vignettes/analysis-sovereignty.Rmd
analysis-sovereignty.Rmd

This page uses the merged file to estimate sovereignty support over time.

Load merged data

Build sovereignty indicator

Results table

Sovereignty support by study year
year respondents n_with_measure sovereignty_support_pct ci_low_pct ci_high_pct
1998 1483 381 43.3 38.3 48.3
2007 4237 3534 43.2 41.6 44.8
2008 1151 989 44.9 41.8 48.0
2012 2349 2066 40.1 38.0 42.2
2014 1517 1234 64.1 61.4 66.8
2018 4322 3338 33.6 32.0 35.2
2022 1521 1284 36.4 33.7 39.0

Trend plot

Notes

  • The sovereignty trend uses the dedicated sovereignty item from each study.
  • Confidence intervals are binomial 95% intervals using normal approximation.
  • n_with_measure in the table shows where coverage is thinner.
